teacherRegistration.nameStepDescription: שמך לא יוצג ברבים, ויישמר חסוי ומאובטח.
teacherRegistration.phoneStepDescription: מספר הטלפון שלך לא יוצג ברבים, ויישמר חסוי ומאובטח.
teacherRegistration.phoneConsent: Yes, the Scratch Team may call me to verify my Teacher Account if needed
teacherRegistration.validationPhoneConse: You must consent to verification of your Teacher Account
teacherRegistration.privacyDescription: המידע שלך לא יוצג ברבים, ויישמר חסוי ומאובטח.
teacherRegistration.useScratchStepDescri: Tell us a little about how you plan to use Scratch. Why do we ask for this information
teacherRegistration.useScratchMaxLength: תיאור חייב להיות 300 תווים לכל היותר
teacherRegistration.howUseScratch: How do you plan to use Scratch at your organization?
teacherRegistration.emailStepDescription: We will send you a confirmation email that will allow you to access your Scratch Teacher Account.
teacherRegistration.validationAge: Sorry, teachers must be at least 13 years old
